verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] become fixated on his ability to issue pardons , asking his aides to compile a list of candidates and stirring dissent in the West Wing .
[ARG1: President Trump] has [V: become] [ARG2: fixated on his ability to issue pardons] , [ARGM-ADV: asking his aides to compile a list of candidates and stirring dissent in the West Wing] .
